text: This article lists all the confirmed national football squads for the 1987 European Competition for Women's Football. Players marked (c) were named as captain for their national squad. ==== Head coach: Martin Reagan ==== Head coach: Ettore Recagni ==== Head coach: Erling Hokstad ==== Head coach: Ulf Lyfors Source: Swedish Football Association ==References== ==External links== * 1987 – Match Details at RSSSF.com Category:UEFA Women's Championship squads Squads
title: 1987 European Competition for Women's Football squads
